title: My Brother's Best Friend
description: Alec son to billionaires, high school hockey star, and my brother's annoying best friend.I hate everything about him, until he sneaks into my bedroom one night during one of my brother's infamous parties and takes what he wants from me.My Brother's Best Friend is the fifth book in the Bad Boys of Redwood Academy series by Emilia Rose. It can be read as a standalone.
author: Emilia  Rose
